playn.core
Interface Net

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetImpl
public interface Net

PlayN network interface.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Net.Builder
          Builds a request and allows it to be configured and executed.
static class Net.HttpException
          Used to report HTTP error responses by get(java.lang.String, playn.core.util.Callback) and post(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, playn.core.util.Callback).
static interface Net.Response
          Communicates an HTTP response to the caller.
static interface Net.WebSocket
          Encapsulates a web socket.
 
Method Summary
 Net.WebSocket createWebSocket(String url, Net.WebSocket.Listener listener)
          Create a websocket with given URL and listener.
 void get(String url, Callback<String> callback)
          Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified URL.
 void post(String url, String data, Callback<String> callback)
          Performs an HTTP POST request to the specified URL.
 Net.Builder req(String url)
          Creates a builder for a request with the specified URL.
